## ThirdwebSDK.getMarketplace() method

Get an instance of a Marketplace contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMarketplace(address: string): Marketplace;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

Marketplace

the contract
